alert.note: Alert for Autauga; Elmore; Montgomery (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Autauga, southwestern Elmore and northwestern Montgomery Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 545 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Prattville, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Northwestern Montgomery, Prattville, Millbrook, Elmore, Coosada, Deatsville, Hunter, Montgomery Zoo, Boylston, Bob Woodruff Lake, Maxwell Air Force Base, Autauga County Airport and Wetumpka Municipal Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
